title: Syd Barrett - You Got It Now
description:
Syd Barrett - You Got It Now (SODA 62), ST/BT/LP

Very rare Euro bootleg LP. This record will cost you up to $40.00 on Ebay plus airmail postage from the EU (if you can find it). 

Most all of Side 1 is previously released and included on the Have You Got It Yet? 1.0 version. Much of Side 2 is previously unreleased and unheard material from the David Bowie sponsored 1973 sessions. No lead guitar or vocal tracks were ever recorded for these sessions. Two versions of the Kevin Ayers song are on this release. For you Puritans, the second version is the one that is actually on the LP, but due to misidentification on the original Kevin Ayers CD, it is not the version of the song that actually has Syd. Although it sounds better, it only has Kevin Ayers sounding very Syd-like. For you Syd fans, the FIRST version of the song on this torrent is the one believed by Laughing Madcaps cognoscenti to have Syd-- you can hear him mixed down in the right channel. 

original LP -> turntable -> preamp -> Apple PowerBook -> Audacity (sampled at 24?-bit/96khz) -> ClickRepair (very light) -> xAct (Flac files) -> mailed data DVD-R -> FlacFrontEnd -> WAV -> Cool Edit Pro (convert 32-bit/96kHz to 16-bit/44.1kHz) -> WAV -> FlacfrontEnd 6 (no SBE)


01. Wouldn't You Miss Me (Dark Globe) - Take 1 (1987 Malcolm Jones Mix)
02. She Took A Long Cold Look At Me - Take 5 (1987 Malcolm Jones Mix)
03. Wined And Dined - Takes 1 & 2
04. Golden Hair - Instrumental Version #2
05. Bob Dylan Blues
06a. Kevin Ayers - Singing A Song In The Morning (Actual track with Syd on guitar in Right Channel)
06. Kevin Ayers - Religious Experience (Singing A Song In The Morning) - Take 10 (Track on LP incorrectly included due to misidentification on the original Kevin Ayers CD)

1974-08-12, EMI Studios:
07. Boogie #1
08. Boogie #2
09. Boogie #3
10. If You Go #1
11. Ballad (Unfinished)
12. Chooka-Chooka Chug Chug
13. If You Go #2
14. Untitled
15. Slow Boogie
16. John Lee Hooker
17. Fast Boogie

Modified from the original Yeeshkull torrent to include Track 06a. Many thanks to the original uploader, not least for allowing me to keep my copy of this LP unplayed.
